title: Mizoram reports 103 fresh COVID-19 cases, tally at 5,513
description: Aizawl, Apr 27 (PTI) At least 103 more people, including 19 children, tested positive for COVID-19 in Mizoram on Tuesday, pushing the tally in the state to 5,513, an official said.

title: Whole nation stands in solidarity with people of Mizoram hit by wildfire: Rahul
description: New Delhi, Apr 26 (PTI) Congress leader Rahul Gandhi on Monday expressed concern over a wildfire spreading in Mizoram and hoped that the state would overcome the devastation.

title: Mizoram forest fire spreads to towns, IAF joins rescue op
description: Lunglei (Mizoram), April 26 (ANI): For more than 32 hours now, a forest fire has been raging in the hills of south Mizoram, spreading to towns and villages of two neighbouring districts Lunglei and Lawngtlai. Indian Air Force helicopter equipped with Bambi Bucket was deployed on April 26 to douse forest fire in Lunglei district. The fire reportedly started at 7 am on Apr 23 in the forested hills near Lunglei town. So far, no injuries or casualties have been reported.

title: Centre OKs 13 new oxygen plants for the northeast, none for Assam - EastMojo
description: These 13 are among the 551 dedicated Pressure Swing Adsorption (PSA) medical oxygen generation plants to be set up inside public health facilities across the country.

title: 22 fresh cases push Mizoram's COVID-19 tally to 5,410
description: Aizawl, Apr 26 (PTI) At least 22 people, including two children, have tested positive for COVID-19 in Mizoram, taking the tally in the state to 5,410, an official said on Monday.

title: Amid Covid spike, infectious diseases hit animals in Arunachal, Mizoram
description: Amid the rising Covid-19 cases in the region, foot-and-mouth disease (FMD) has hit some semi-wild mithuns in Arunachal Pradesh, while African Swine Fever (ASF) has struck some pigs in Mizoram, leading to their deaths, officials said on Saturday.

title: No case of new COVID-19 variants in Mizoram: Official
description: The Mizoram government has sent 326 samples of COVID-19 infected positive patients to National Institute of Biomedical Genomics in West Bengal for genome sequencing.

title: Zero COVID vaccine wastage in Mizoram; Manipur among top states wasting vaccines
description:
Mizoram has wasted “zero” COVID-19 vaccines till April 11 while Manipur is among the top 5 states in India that account for maximum wastage of the vaccine, data released by the Union government has revealed.

The data shared by the Union government in an RTI reply said that the vaccine, which need

title: Mizo woman volunteers to take care of 93-year-old COVID positive lady - EastMojo
description: CT Ramnunmawii who recovered from COVID-19 at a COVID care centre was about to leave, when she heard that an elderly lady has been admitted without any caretaker. She came forward to help this lady.

title: Covid-19 in Mizoram: 7-day lockdown in Aizawl, 10 other district headquarters
description: To combat the spread of Covid-19, a seven-day lockdown was imposed in Aizawl and 10 other district headquarters in Mizoram. The restrictions came into force at 4 AM on Tuesday and would remain till 4 AM on April 26.

description: Mizoram Schools Closed: As per the latest update, the Mizoram State Government and the Education Department have decided to close-down schools across the state for students of upto Class 8 in the wake of the rising number of COVID-19 cases.
